text:
(Asahi, where did she go?
 She left as soon as the business was over, but--)

(I don't think she went too far,
 and there's no reply... Should I go look for her--)

Asahi! Where were you?
You shouldn't just leave without saying anything.

More importantly, Producer-san,
I want you to see this photo. What could it be?

Oh... Isn't that a message board? In the past, people
used to write messages on it and use it for meetings.

In the past, there were no smartphones,  so if you
went outside, there was no way to communicate.
